name: Madverse Rewound
description:
MADVERSE: Rewound is a Third-Person Shooter (TPS) single-player RPG game with themes revolving around knights, Medieval Age, Science Fiction, and Action. As a first version, it is comprised of two levels.

Hello fella! A stranger came to our village yesterday, saying he comes from the future and he holds an important piece of information that will help our kingdom survive. However, soon after, enemy troops invaded the village and kidnapped the time traveler. This unexpected attack made us believe that what the stranger informed us about might be true. Thus, your mission is to eliminate the invading troops and rescue the time traveler. You can attack enemies with your sword, or by shooting arrows. Note that you have a limited amount of arrows! And make sure you eat well and don’t die of hunger. There are also many items in the village that might be of use to you. Make sure you take anything that you might need. Of these items, there are potions that can make you invincible, give you health and increase your damage. Good luck on your mission

MADVERSE: Rewound was created in two weeks. Naeem Hassan worked mainly on the backend (the database and game logic), Carl Abou Saada Nujaim worked on the UI and Mohammad Jamil Chahine designed the levels.
